评论详情: this bodysuit fit great and the fabric was great quality. there is no tummy tuck though so just keep that in mind when ordering. overall great body suit.
I was about 26 weeks pregnant in this, and it fit well into the rest of the pregnancy. Super soft, and pairs well with flannels for a casual fit

评论概述: Comfortable, Stylish, and Perfect for Workouts!
评论详情: I’m so impressed with this exercise romper! It’s become my go-to outfit for working out, and I can’t recommend it enough. The material is incredibly soft and stretchy, which makes it super comfortable and perfect for any type of exercise. I usually wear xs and sized up to small and the fit was great!

评论概述: Super cute just not good for long torsos lol
评论详情: Idk why I even tried. I've never been able to wear a piece.

Finally, a product that is solid, good quality and no butt scrunch haha. This is my first crz yoga product but I can’t wait to try more. I love how there is Lycra in this onesie which is the same material Lululemon uses. I did a leg day and it held up well. For reference: I am 5’6 and I have thick big muscles so I got a large. It seems to be stretchy i maybe could have gotten away with a medium but otherwise it’s true to size i think.
Super thin material that was see through, and the romper was not fitted - very baggy in awkward areas. Do not purchase!

评论概述: Super Comfortable for Lounging, but Not Perfect for Exercise
评论详情: I love this romper because it’s incredibly comfortable! Just a note — I’ve only worn it for lounging, not for exercise. I have a longer torso and usually avoid rompers, but the adjustable straps make this one more wearable.  The built-in bra is a mixed bag for me. I appreciate the removable padding and the bit of built-in support, but as someone who’s a bit chestier, it doesn’t quite offer enough support for me. While it’s not uncomfortable or causing any spillage, I’d definitely need a separate sports bra if I were to wear this for a workout. In that case, I’d prefer no built-in bra so I could use my own.  It’s definitely flattering, though the shorts do ride up a bit, which could be an issue during physical activity. For lounging or running errands, it’s not a problem. Overall, it’s a comfy and cute piece that works well for casual wear, even if it’s not ideal for more active use.

This yoga athletic romper is amazing! The fit is perfect, flattering, and true to size. The adjustable straps make it easy to customize for comfort, and the padded top adds great support without needing an extra bra. The material feels high-quality and looks like it’s from an expensive brand, but it’s so affordable! The shorts are just the right length, offering coverage while still looking stylish. It’s perfect for yoga, workouts, or even casual wear. I absolutely love this romper—highly recommend it for anyone looking for a chic and functional athletic piece!
It’s so comfortable and love the padding in the bra area
Great fit, as pictured, great quality!!! So flattering!!
Sized up and wore this through all 9 months of my pregnancy. It has lots of give but is a nice high quality fabric. Buttery soft and not too thin.
perfect lulu dupe
Looks good only has a weird fitting at the rib cage personally
Although the shorts do sometimes roll up in hot yoga, I’m pleasantly surprised by the fit of this! I am 5’10”, 150 pounds and the medium size fits great.

评论概述: I WISH they would fix the seam
评论详情: Everything about this from the feel, the color, the fit- amazing 10/10. BUT the seam going directly through your legs causes a camel toe. Therefore making it super unflattering despite it being perfect everywhere else.
Fit us amazing, material is soft. Very flattering and stays put in yoga class. Got a tons of compliments, so I'm buying more in other colors

Let me tell you ladies, I *never* write reviews, and I’m on Amazon all the time. But this bodysuit? Sis, it's hands down the best one I’ve ever bought. It’s thick, but not heavy—it snatches you in all the right places, and the way it has my girls sitting? *Chef’s kiss!* Whether you’re layering it under a shirt or rocking it solo for that athleisure vibe, it just makes you look and feel SO good.  It’s breathable, super comfortable, and easy to wear. I’m obsessed—I already ordered more! The only thing I wish was different is that seam at the waist, but honestly, if they fixed that? I’d buy one in every color, *twice.* It’s that versatile and that perfect!

评论概述: Super quality and overall fit while pregnant
评论详情: My regular size is XS, as I’m pregnant currently I decided to size up and ordered size S and it fits perfectly! The material is amazing. No damage after several washes, I’m just happy with the purchase. Will order in XS later on. For reference, I’m 5’4.

评论概述: I did not think I would love this so much
评论详情: I really didnt think I would end up loving this as much as I do. 32DD 6/8 athletic build my legs are thick so I got a medium but probably could have gone with the small. I feel weirdly confident in this love it for errands with an oversized button down and birks or Adidas and a baseball hat. Quality feels really nice too even with the thin straps
I bought during pregnancy after seeing an influencer recommend and I loved it. It’s buttery soft, stretchy and I’m actually using postpartum now. Will be buying more colors!

评论概述: The best yoga bodysuit I have ever worn!
评论详情: The material is so buttery soft indeed. It makes me want to do yoga and stretch all the time. It is so comfortable it feels like second skin. I love the added pads so that I don’t have to wear nipple covers anymore especially in the summer heat where they just slide off me when I sweat. I plan to put jeans over it in the fall and continue to wear it. The color is beautiful too. It feels like luxury to wear it. Totally recommend- this feels like lululemon or alo yoga quality!

评论概述: Very comfortable!! Like lululemon align material!
评论详情: Very comfy! Going to purchase more as they're perfect to wear under fall/winter dresses! Fits perfectly under Zara button down  dresses I wear for work.

Currently 5 months pregnant and was looking for a stretchy jumpsuit. I tried 3 other amazon jumpsuits before landing on this one! It was the most expensive out of the jumpers I bought, but DEFINITELY worth it. Feels high quality & fits the body perfectly! I will be ordering more in different colors for fall 🤎 5’7 and 145 - ordered a large for growing bump!

Wanted to love this so bad, but unfortunately the sizing is off. I'm 5'6 and 120 lbs and typically wear an XS. Tried both the XS and S, but both are way too short and ride up and give a major front wedgie. Had to return. Really wish they'd fix this issue ☹️
This bodysuit feels identical to the lululemon align biker shorts and bodysuits!! The fabric is so soft and flattering. 10/10 recommend!
I loved this for pregnancy but did feel like the shorts were a little shorter than I expected and because the material is so soft they ride up slightly
I bought a small, I’m 5’8”, 135 lbs, it fits so good and it’s so comfortable. Will be buying more colors!
I love absolutely everything by this brand. I had to return this because despite going a size up it didn’t fit my pregnant belly well but quality and cut were as advertised!
Love this workout romper. I have a long torso and am always nervous ordering rompers due to this. Comfortable and great for a workout and cute paired with a jacket to run errands after.
This bodysuit is like butter - so soft and comfortable.  The shorts dont ride up which is great and I love that you can throw on a pullover or sweatshirt and it still looks super cute.
True to size. Fits great. the fabric is buttery soft and really comfortable to wear.

This is my 4th pregnancy, and I wanted more staples that aren’t maternity but bump friendly. That I could wear when I’m no longer pregnant. I am 21 weeks pregnant. I normally and 5 4 and 130 lbs. small is my normal size. Due to my growing bump I sized up to a medium. The comfort exceeds expectations. It is buttery soft. Has a built in bra. Overall 10/10. Will be buying in more colors.
Comfy and padding is good for support
So comfortable and flattering - the material is so soft and perfect too
Very good material. Not as thick as I expected! But definitely keeping and wearing all the time!
Good Quality, however the fabric isn't compressing for my normal size, I would size down if you want it to fit more compressed.
Super soft! Got an xs and it fit perfect! Great price for the quality.

This one piece is AMAZING! I feel so good in it and it’s the quality of a luxury brand like lululemon! Also, this fits a larger chest (when most athletic wear doesn’t). I ordered a large and it fits true to size! I highly recommend!

The fabric of this item was so soft and buttery. It felt so comfortable on my body. The reason for my return was that it was too short in the thighs and kept riding up. I feel like it needed to be a bit more compressed to my legs. I purchased a size medium, 5’7 in height and have thicker thighs.
Love this so much I bought in multiple colors.So comfy and soft! True to size. I’m a size 8 and medium fits perfect. The material is very forgiving and no issues with transparency.
34 weeks pregnant and this was so comfy! Totally recommend if you want comfort.
Loves this so much! Super comfortable, great fabric quality, not see through at all and it looks amazing!
No issues. Very comfortable and good quality

I took a chance on this during Prime Day and I’m SOOOO happy I did! The fabric and the quality is INCREDIBLE. I’m 5”2’ , 135 pounds, size 36 D bra and a medium fit me like glove. Would give it 10 stars if I could!
Soft, perfect length and amazing quality. I need 10 more!
Such great quality. The compression and built in bra truly creates a great fit.

I really want to buy another one because I just can’t get it washed and back into the rotation often enough. I’m 5’4 usually 125lbs, but am currently 7 months pregnant. I bought the medium and it’s very comfortable. Other reviews say it’s roomy, and I’d have to agree. If I weren’t pregnant, I’d probably go with a small.

Was so hesitant on buying as a girlie with thick thighs and oh my word I’d like to buy 10 more! This is SO comfy, stretchy, and perfect length. I used to work at lululemon and this is just as good if not better than the align material! Usually a 6/8 size and got a medium it’s perfect! 10/10!

I absolutely love this item. I was not 100% sure just because I love anything namebrand, lulu, Alo yoga etc….. But then I saw an influencer posted this and I decided to take a chance! I am 5’4 and about 100 (petite girly) and on the more slender side, I went with a XXS…IT FIT LIKE A GLOVE😍 Like I said a must staple piece in your closet you can wear it during the summer out to run errands or you can wear it to the gym or to pilates, I love that it has a built-in bra ( I’m a 32a) And I felt good in that area You are also able to remove the padding, which is nice!

I love this bodysuit, I’m definitely ordering more! I paired this under a pair of flowy shorts. I’m postpartum and not quite confident enough to wear this on my own, but the added tummy support + additional coverage was perfect.  I’m 150lbs, 5’5”, and wore a medium.
So cute, so soft, so comfortable. Great quality similar to their leggings. Will likely buy more colors!

These photos are post workout. You can see that I didn’t have extremely noticeable sweat lines which was awesome! Great piece for lounging and working out. I’m 150lbs 5’7 and got a small. I have gotten all smalls in my crzy yoga gear! Bets part is it’s affordable clothing!

It does ride up because of the front seam but it’s super soft and stretchy and great for around the house and maybe a fanny pack or tied shirt around the waist so you don’t have to worry about the ride up if you wear it out lol I have it in black though and wore that out and yeah it rode up but not as noticeable as the red for sure

评论概述: Great for people with shorter torsos
评论详情: I am 5’9” and 170#. A medium fits me but the torso isn’t quite long enough.. so there’s some extra cleavage. Overall, it’s comfortable. The shorts portion is really short and rides up a lot. I find myself pulling them down a lot. The idea is there but the execution could have been better. The fabric is not at all forgiving. Don’t wear this one if you feel bloated. It’s a thin fabric but still soft and overall comfortable. No compression (I find this as a positive). I wish the torso were a little longer and the shorts a little longer. Just by an inch maybe.

So soft and stretchy have worn from 30wks and can’t wait to wear it after! I did size up from my normal small to a medium only because I’m all belly and I didn’t want it tight! But it’s so soft I don’t think it would have pinched the bump if I stayed in a small

I have never.. and I mean never left a review.. I have bought thousands of things on Amazon.. but I haddddddd to leave a review.. I’m a mom of two and I loathe my body.. but when I wear this I feel so cute and actually like the way I look.. this thing is such wonderful material and so buttery soft and thick… I am going to buy more.
The most PERFECT piece to add to your workout collection. Super soft, thick and breathable fabric. Great price. I need in every color. True to size. Size medium in photo. Easy to dress up or down.

This romper is the most comfortable thing any pregnant (or non pregnant) momma could want. The thickness and quality of the material makes the coverage of your body very comfortable to wear. I paired it with a very light plaid long sleeve button up and it was the cutest outfit!

Material is very soft and very comfortable. The fit is extremely flattering, I am 5'8 and 130 lbs and the small fit me perfect, I love how the torso was not baggy and fit well. They also sell the same style but with a longer short inseam for those who complain its too short. I will be wearing this everyday and buying it in all the colors, I have navy blue and purple so far and I love them!

It is everything you'd want in a romper but the smell is one thing I cant get passed. it smells like chemicals even after I wash it. I still bought one in every color bc they are literally a Lululemon dupe but I just need to soak it in vinegar or something to get the smell out. Overall really great staple to run errands or work out in.

评论概述: They’re cute, short length is too short
评论详情: I really wanted to like them but once I tried them on, the shorts are way too short, not sure where I would wear shorts/romper that length.

Very comfortable and soft material. I am very picky about clothes because of my sensory issues - and this set is something I could wear everyday. I weigh 125 and am 5’4. I don’t have a large chest , I have very broad shoulders, and muscular thighs - small fits great. Just adjusted the straps.

I am 5’8” and 115lbs and I got a small and it is verryyyy short. It’s wearable but noticeable very small and feels that way. If I got a medium it would be too big around my waist and stomach area. It has adjustable straps but even with those it doesn’t fit the way it should. Sad because I wanted to order more

I got this for my daughter and she loved it. She says that is comfortable and thee material is great.  The quality is great. She has worn it multiple times already and it washes very well it hasn’t shrunk at all.  Buy it  regret it

This women's romper is incredibly flattering! The soft fabric feels luxurious against the skin, and the proportions are just right. The snug fit holds everything in place, giving a sleek and polished look. It's comfortable yet stylish, perfect for any occasion. I love how this romper accentuates all the right curves while providing a comfortable and secure fit. It's definitely a must-have in any wardrobe for those looking for a flattering and chic outfit option.
Fit like a glove, very flattering and soft material. Squat proof and not see through, but not too thick to be hot. Highly highly recommend!
I’m 5’6 180lbs  And this romper is literally amazing , I can’t rave about it enough !! Fabric is buttery soft, and most importantly the middle inseam doesn’t “ride up” at all :)

I love it. It fits tight but doesn’t make me feel like a sausage link. It’s super stretchy too. I was worried the legs would be super tight because I have pretty bulky legs but it’s so cute and comfy!! I’m a 34A 5’2 and 135 pounds for reference.
Fits true to size. Super soft.
Love this onsie. I got M, could’ve gotten small. so soft and comfortable!! Not see through. Great for boobs. I am 5’4, 135#, DD boobs and S or M would be good. medium is a tad big. Love it tho.
I have never worn something like this before and it’s so comfy and just throw a flannel around the waste . I love it .
Keeps rolling up and it becomes really uncomfortable to wear. The fabric by itself is great. I wish the shorts were longer
Confortable ! Love it!
The material is sooo buttery soft & makes you feel snatched in the waist without being too tight. So comfy & cute! Highly recommend

I purchased this to have a comfortable piece to wear during and post pregnancy. The material is soft and very stretchy, and it fits perfectly. I also like that it isn't too low-cut because some rompers just don't fit well over my smaller chest.

I am a die hard lululemon girl. I will pay the $$$ for it and rather spend extra for better quality (imo) than waste my money on “dupes”. But I’m so shocked with this romper! Fits like a glove!!! I’m in between small & medium, and in lulu I’m like a 6 maybe an 8 with certain styles.. i decided to go with the small and so glad i did! Fabric is soft like lulu ! Even my bf said it was soft. Straps are adjustable and also no camel toe! That’s an issue I’ve been having with some gym leggings esp 🍋! I just ordered 2 more. Just wish they had an orange color!
Great stretch which accommodates my growing belly without feeling constricting. It’s petite friendly as well. Buy your regular size. Just like the picture. Fully recommend.

评论概述: White is see through but very comfy
评论详情: I loved everything about this one piece & had hoped the white wouldn’t be so see through but it unfortunately was. I’ll be returning for a different color.

评论概述: Stretchy while holding everything in and not see through!
评论详情: The material is soft, the straps are adjustable, and the padding is amazing. Padding enough that you don't have to wear a bra but also enough stretch to wear one if you want. I'm 5'5" 165lbs and I bought a size L and it fits great, I could probably size down but I like the fit. I'm not seeing any see through areas on it and am ready to rock it all summer long!
LOVED it! Need every color. I’m 5’3 133 and got a it is perfect. The white isn’t see thru for me personally but I haven’t worn it working out yet! It’s so cute and soft and stretchy! Get it!

I love this jumpsuit! I live in a hot climate and wanted something easy and cute to throw on & sweat in - and this is absolutely perfect. It’s a bit long in the body, but I’m 5’2 so that might not be an issue for others. It’s flattering but not clingy to your body. It is definitely “buttery soft”!

Love the fit and the material but just a PSA this one is the shorter 4” inseam. There are other CRZ romper suits with 6” shorts - that is the typical length of CRZ shorts I buy so my next romper will be one of those!
Very soft and comfortable. Color is perfect
So cute, great quality!! ❤️

I really loved the long leg version so I thought I would try the short version, and holy are they short! I am 47 and I just can't bring myself to wear these out of the house. Kept them for around the house workouts and lounging. Size is good, I chose medium, and I am 5'6" and 160 lbs.
Fits perfectly and super stretchy
So COMFY, FLATTERING, and stretchy, I will be purchasing this in all the colors! Definitely not a workout material or level of support but so great for lounging and errands.

I purchased this in my second trimester to take on a little trip to warmer weather. Pre-pregnancy I would be an XS and I sized up to a Small here, size was great. Very comfortable for daily wear and for walks! I purchased in the blue as well.
Pretty see through but not terrible

I got this because we’re approaching the hot, humid summer. I’ve got a few injuries and so I need something comfortable in my life. This is absolutely amazing for me as a daily staple. I’ve got 3 colors!! The built in bra offers good support, the material is so soft and light, it’s just all around comfortable. 10/10 recommend!
This is buttery soft and the fit is amazing! Definitely a 🍋 dupe but at an affordable price.
this would literally be PERFECT if only it had pockets. fits really well and the fabric is 10/10

Soft and very comfy material. Fit me great. My only concern is it isn’t as supportive for bigger breast girlies and shows off chest a little much for my liking. I still wore it and will going forward but maybe more so at home than out.
Very disappointed. After wearing maybe twice the fabric has begun pilling.
It’s good quality material but the back lower back area is very big. If you’re thin, it’s likely it will do the same to you.
Everything about it is perfect, and now I want it in every color! The material is such high quality and extremely comfortable
I get asked where I bought this every time I wear it.  I will say it is probably best for short, small chested girls unless you size up.
Get it. Trust me.
The fabric, the length, the sizing. They are all simply great. I’ve ordered shorts before and they are all great. I’m 6/8 in pants and M/L in shirts and I ordered M
I’ve worn this 2 days in a row! I would definitely buy again!!
